tool_description: Human readable address (GeoCode format) for your GPS location
name: SmartAddress
title: SmartAddress

api_list.name: GeoCodeEncode
api_list.description: Encode any GPS location (latitude, longitude) value into a more human readable address format

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Decimal value of Longitude of location input as string

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Decimal value of Latitude of location input as string

google.address: Hyde Park, Elizabeth St, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

api_list.name: GeoCodeDecode
api_list.description: Decode GeoCode to GPS location (lat/lng value)

required_parameters.name: geocode
required_parameters.description: GeoCode value to decode to GPS lat/lng coordinate
